turkish_example_sentence: O uzun yolculuğu sabırla yapmışsa, çok yorulurdu.
english_example_sentence: If he had done the long journey patiently, he would have been very tired.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы он терпеливо совершил долгое путешествие, он бы очень устал.
